Because A; it is clearly not a first offense and B; it is flaming, spamming and has an incredibly high stupidity density.

You failed to learn from multiple previous punishments, and thus got wrecked. Enjoy your wreck.
More importantly, repeated use of hate speech.

> [{quoted}](name=LoveeLuffy,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=qcyXjU2K,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-05-04T21:32:00.867+0000) JeanfromBB: no %%%
> JeanfromBB: o my %%%%%%

The censored words are pretty much always punished, and fairly aggressively. It's considered derogatory language and hate speech, which Riot does NOT tolerate.

> JeanfromBB:  nkvcxu80jiolgh98v xcutrhrb

This is just spam, and needless. It's no where NEAR as bad as the contents of the first quote, but it doesn't make your chat logs look good.

-----------------------------

Another thing to keep in mind is that you can eventually work your way up to a ban for violations that would normally earn a chat restriction -- if you've received a 14-day ban previously that is a warning that your next punishment WILL be a permanent ban, since you're clearly not getting better. It's not simply a case of each "level" of toxicity having a corresponding "level" of ban, and a permanent ban being reserved for the most egregious behavior -- the permanent ban is the endpoint of all non-reformed toxicity, and egregious behavior just gets you there much faster.

Used hate speech which typically bumps you up the punishment ladder. Write a support ticket if you disagree.

----------------------------------------------
